text: The name Gwen [ gwen ] is a female given name of Welsh origin. It means "white, holy". The name is often a shortened form of Gwendolyn. Famous people with the name include the singer Gwen Stefani. Fictional people with the name include Gwen Hotchkiss from the soap opera Passions. This name was ranked #855 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Gwen Ren√©e Stefani, American singer-songwriter * Gwen Shamblin Lara, American writer (1955-2021) * Gwen Ifill, American journalist, television newscaster and author (1955-2016) * Gwen Graham, American attorney, politician and member of the Democratic Party ==References== Category:Given names
title: Gwen
